quitreally(1) General Commands Manual quitreally(1)

NAME

quitreally — diagnostic support for this feature

SYNOPSIS

quitreally [-h] [--help] [-v] [--verbose] [--status] [--inspect APP] [--visible APP]

DESCRIPTION

quitreally Query various bits of infomation about the quit really feature.

Commands

---status
Returns information about the applications which have exited and left behind running non-visible children applications, processes, or loaded jobs.
--inspect APP
Returns information about the application specified by Ar APP
--visible APP
Returns whether the given application is visible or not.

Specifying an application

Applications are specified either by

name
the name of the application
bundleIdentifier
the bundle identifier of the application
ASN
the ASN of a running application, specified as 0xAAAAAAAA-0xBBBBBBBB, where A and B are hex digits
PID
the pid of a running application
bundle path
the bundle path of a running application
all
all applications
exited
all applications which have exited but left behind
